vclaim: A video shows a law enforcement officer holding the hand of a woman and escorting her down stairs during a pro-Trump riot at the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021.
title: Did Police Officer Hold Rioter’s Hand at US Capitol?
subtitle: A video of a law enforcement officer escorting a woman down stairs during a riot at the U.S. Capitol drew comparisons to the treatment of Black Lives Matter protesters.
author: Bethania Palma
